sentence: smartphone Use of location-based information and geosocial services among
For location services: % of smartphone owners who use their phone to get directions,
recommendations, or other information related to their present location.
For geosocial services: % of smartphone owners who use a service such as Foursquare or
Gowalla to "check in to certain smartphone locations or share their location with friends Foursquare
Source: Pew Research Center' S tracking Internet & American Life Project April 26-May 22 2011 and
January older, 20-February 19, 2012 tracking surveys For 2011 data cell N=2, 277 adults ages 18 and
